title: Inazuman vs Kikaider: The End of Kikaider 02
description: Saburou Kazeta is a high schooler who discovers that he is actually a mutant with psionic powers, right as the Mutant Empire begins their assault to destroy humanity! With guidance from his sister Miyo, Saburou learns to control his powers as Inazuman and comes into conflict with Jiro, a guitar-playing boy who is actually the android Kikaider! Two heroes clash in this retelling of Shotaro Ishinomori's Inazuman crossed over with Kikaider 02!
author: Shotaro Ishinomori
